---
title: "Resources"
---

Here are some helpful resources we've collected to address issues of gender equality and intersections in the (academic) workplace (in no particular order).

### Articles and blog posts

[Don’t be that dude: Handy tips for the male academic](https://tenureshewrote.wordpress.com/2013/09/26/dont-be-that-dude-handy-tips-for-the-male-academic/) from the blog [Tenure, she wrote](https://tenureshewrote.wordpress.com)

[Sexism in the academy](https://www.nplusonemag.com/issue-34/essays/sexism-in-the-academy/) by Troy Vettese

Gruber, J., Mendle, J., Lindquist, K. A., Schmader, T., Clark, L. A., Bliss-Moreau, E., ... & Williams, L. A. (2021). [The future of women in psychological science.](https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/pdf/10.1177/1745691620952789) *Perspectives on Psychological Science, 16*(3), 483-516.

### Books

[*Und jetzt du*](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.de/Buch/Und-jetzt-du-/Tupoka-Ogette/Penguin/e595718.rhd) and [*Exit Racism*](https://www.exitracism.de) by [Tupoka Ogette](https://www.tupoka.de)

[*Zugang verwehrt. Keine Chance in der Klassengesellschaft: wie Klassismus soziale Ungleichheit fördert*](https://www.w1-media.de/produkte/zugang-verwehrt-557889) and other books by [Francis Seeck](https://www.francisseeck.net)
